# itemProvider

**Instance Property**

The item provider for the item being pasted or dropped.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var itemProvider: NSItemProvider { get }
```

## Accessing the text paste item’s data

- **localObject**: The custom local object that the copy or drag source optionally attached to the drag item.
